channel.title: Umatilla Mission Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Umatilla Mission Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End OR-331 North at OR-11
item.description: End OR-331 North at OR-11 in Umatilla County. Turn right for OR-11 north to Milton-Freewater; turn left for OR-11 south to Pendleton.

item.title: OR-331 North at Mission Road
item.description: OR-331 North at Mission Road. Turn right for Mission Road east to Mission and Gibbon. Turn left for Mission Road west to Pendleton. Continue north on OR-331 for OR-11 to Milton-Freewater.

item.title: OR-331 South - Umatilla River
item.description: Bridge over Umatilla River on OR-331 south.

item.title: OR-11 South at OR-331
item.description: OR-11 South at OR-331 (unsigned). Use OR-331 south (Mission Highway) to Mission and LaGrande. All I-84 truck traffic use OR-331.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-331
item.description: OR-11 South Approaching OR-331 (Mission Highway). Use Mission Highway for Mission and LaGrande. I-84 traffic is encouraged to use the Mission Highway instead of going through Pendleton.

item.title: Kusi Road at OR-331
item.description: Kusi Road at OR-331. Turn left on OR-331 for I-84.

item.title: Kusi Road at OR-331
item.description: Kusi Road at OR-331. Turn left on OR-331 for I-84.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 216
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 216 - Milton-Freewater/Walla Walla
